name: The Lonely Cone Man
description:
THE LONELY CONE MAN -a mini game about loneliness The Lonely Cone Men are waiting for someone to spend time with them!

Left screen: Try to answer all 10 questions about loneliness!

Right Screen: This is the island where the little cone men live. The creatures will automatically socialise with each other, but do keep track of their energy(Green)and satisfaction(Pink) bar! Don't leave them alone for too long or else their satisfaction level will lower! (and they will start playing their phones). Drag and drop the little cone men to socialize with each other!(the cone men that aren't moving around cannot be dragged. They are recharging their energy) Click the buttons above their heads to recharge their satisfaction bar! Press Z to zoom in and X to zoom out of the island.

{ It might take a few seconds to load at first. Afterwards, press anywhere to initiate the game.}

Browser: Game may not be able to run on Chrome.Safari works fine.
